staff.name: Karam
staff.statement: Karam is the Founder of United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay. Karam started the server in September, 2023 and has been been running it since.

staff.name: Not_L4nd
staff.statement: Land is one of the Co Founders here at United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay. Land made an entrance around the beggining of 2025 and has been here since.

staff.name: Fynnandelias
staff.statement: Im proud to be a Co Founder here at United Kingdom Birmingham Roleplay! I joined last year on the 2nd of august and I remember the first session I joined and instantly wanted to become staff. Whilst being a staff member I have had some ups and downs including retiring and being fired! After some well earnt deeication I made it and here I am now!

staff.name: James
staff.statement: James is one of the Assistant Founders here at United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay. James an entrance in XX of XX. James has enjoyed it.

staff.name: Mcrunner
staff.statement: Joshua (McRunner) has been in here for a very long time so we will not mention when he joined, though he loves United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay.

staff.name: Josh L
staff.statement: Josh has been in United Kingdom: Birmingham Rolplay for a few months. He is an assistant founder here aswell as a developer.

staff.name: Only Braclets
staff.statement: Hard working and dedicated member of staff.

staff.name: Max
staff.statement: Max has developed a strong foundation of experience since 2023, consistently applying his skills and expertise to contribute to organizational excellence. With a commitment to professionalism and a drive for continuous improvement, he leverages his knowledge to support the objectives of the OE and ensure the highest standards are maintained.

staff.name: Cors
staff.statement: Hard working and dedicated member of staff.

staff.name: Pjer
staff.statement: Ex IA. Reinstated as a Trial Administrator at 1st March and now Deputy Director,  never give up.
staff.memorial: Gone but never forgotten - a true fighter

staff.name: Davontae
staff.statement: Hard working and dedicated member of staff.

staff.name: Finn
staff.statement: Finn has been contributing to the server since 2025, quickly establishing himself as a talented developer. Leveraging his skills in web development and digital management, he now serves as a management member, helping to maintain high standards across the community's online platforms and supporting the objectives of the server with professionalism and innovation.
